name: Sleepy Slugcat
description: Let the lil dude sleep ! With a supplement of Zzs<LINE>When you are in a calm place, take the time to sleep by holding down and relax.<LINE>Comes with a bunch of options for your Zs color, size and the contents of the Zzs.<LINE><LINE>Make sure your slugcat feels safe and that they weil not fall into a hole while sleeping !
